name: librogenie
description: A magical PDF translator for your digital library powered by AI
author: User

scripts.electron:dev: concurrently -k "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run electron"
scripts.electron:offline: concurrently -k "npm run dev:offline" "wait-on http://localhost:3001 && NODE_ENV=development electron electron/main-offline.js"
scripts.package:mac:arm64:zip: npm run build && npm run generate:icons && electron-builder --mac zip --arm64 -c.directories.output=/tmp/gemini-pdf-translator-release && node scripts/copy-mac-artifacts.mjs /tmp/gemini-pdf-translator-release release arm64
scripts.package:mac:arm64:dmg: npm run build && npm run generate:icons && electron-builder --mac dmg --arm64 -c.directories.output=/tmp/gemini-pdf-translator-release && node scripts/copy-mac-artifacts.mjs /tmp/gemini-pdf-translator-release release arm64
scripts.package:mac:arm64:tmp: npm run build && npm run generate:icons && electron-builder --mac --arm64 -c.directories.output=/tmp/gemini-pdf-translator-release
scripts.build:all: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run package
